title: Identity Agent Template Schema
description: Configuration schema for the ERC-8004 identity-enabled agent template

AGENT_NAME.description: Agent name (set automatically from project directory name)

AGENT_VERSION.description: Semantic version number for the agent

AGENT_DOMAIN.description: Domain that will host the agent (used for ERC-8004 registration)

PAYMENTS_FACILITATOR_URL.description: x402 facilitator endpoint URL for payment processing

PAYMENTS_RECEIVABLE_ADDRESS.description: Payment address - Ethereum (0x...) or Solana (Base58) format depending on network. Separate from PRIVATE_KEY which is used for EVM identity registration. Can be shared across multiple agents.

RPC_URL.description: Blockchain RPC endpoint URL for on-chain operations

IDENTITY_AUTO_REGISTER.description: Auto-register agent on ERC-8004 identity registry at startup

PRIVATE_KEY.description: Wallet private key for signing transactions (required for identity registration)

notes: This template requires a PRIVATE_KEY for on-chain identity registration. Ensure the wallet has sufficient gas for the target network.
